data.name: Zombie Simulator - Battle Arena DLC
data.detailed_description:
This is the first DLC for Zombie Simulator. It includes a battle arena sandbox. You can create your own battle arena with thousands of the zombies and smash all the things!



HOW TO LAUNCH

To play Zombie Simulator with this DLC enabled, please visit the DLC section in the Zombie Simulator Launcher, make sure "Battle Arena DLC" is owned and loaded, and then launch the DLC by clicking on the Battle Arena button.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: You can create your own battle arena with thousands of the zombies and smash all the things!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3450
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS 10.6+
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 650 GTX / AMD Radeon 7850 HD series card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
